short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: To reduce your too long url

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
URLite is an open source extension to shorten the URL 🔗 of the current tab.
A new URL, https://urlite.cc/xxxxxx, will be generated and copied in the clipboard 📋 .
Theses actions are triggered automatically at the activation of the add-on.
The extension is actionable by a keyboard shortcut : CTRL+SHIFT+U for Windows, Linux and ALT+SHIFT+U for MacOS.
The new URL will redirect permanently to the page you activated the add-on.
Currently, the shorten URLs support only HTTPS 🔒 and not HTTP.

For more informations :
🌐 Official website : https://urlite.cc/
🤝 Github Organization : https://github.com/urlite (Feel free to contribute !)
✉️ Email Contact : urlite.cc@gmail.com

⭐ If you loved the experience, rate or comment the add-on to support us ⭐
